DebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate
DebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of debt outstanding.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Matching Contribution, Percent of Employees' Gross Pay
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.description: Percentage of employees' gross pay for which the employer contributes a matching contribution to a defined contribution plan.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployersMatching.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employers Matching Contribution, Annual Vesting Percentage
DefinedContributionPlanEmployersMatching.description: Percentage of employer's matching contributions to a defined contribution plan that vests in a given year.

DueFromOtherRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due from Other Related Parties, Current
DueFromOtherRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the income tax rates.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDisp.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Business, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDisp.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to disposition of a business not qualifying as a discontinued operation.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationEqui.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Equity in Earnings (Losses) of Unconsolidated Subsidiary, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationEqui.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to equity in earnings (loss) of unconsolidated subsidiaries exempt from income taxes.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Impairment Losses, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to impairment loss.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for share-based payment arrangement.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Gain (Loss) Included in Earnings
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

GainOrLossOnSaleOfPreviouslyUnissuedStoc.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Previously Unissued Stock by Subsidiary
GainOrLossOnSaleOfPreviouslyUnissuedStoc.description: The profit or loss on sales of previously unissued stock by subsidiaries made to investors outside the consolidated group that is not reported as operating income. Represents the difference in the parent company's carrying amount of the equity interest in the subsidiary or equity investee immediately before and after the transaction.

InventoryValuationReserves.label: Inventory Valuation Reserves
InventoryValuationReserves.description: Amount of valuation reserve for inventory.

InventoryWriteDown.label: Inventory Write-down
InventoryWriteDown.description: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

LongTermDebtCurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Current Maturities
LongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt, classified as current. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LossContingencyNumberOfPlaintiffs.label: Loss Contingency, Number of Plaintiffs
LossContingencyNumberOfPlaintiffs.description: Number of plaintiffs that have filed claims pertaining to a loss contingency.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Subsidiary Equity Issuance
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.

NotesReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Notes Receivable, Related Parties, Current
NotesReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization Expense
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense for right-of-use asset from operating lease.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemableNoncont.label: Payments for Repurchase of Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemableNoncont.description: The cash outflow during the period for redemption of redeemable noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.label: Payments to Fund Long-term Loans to Related Parties
PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.description: The cash outflow associated with extending a long-term loan to a related party. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances to Affiliates.

ProceedsFromDividendsReceived.label: Proceeds from Dividends Received
ProceedsFromDividendsReceived.description: Dividends received on equity and other investments during the current period.

TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReporti.label: Translation Adjustment Functional to Reporting Currency, Net of Tax
TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReporti.description: Amount of cumulative translation gain (loss), after tax, from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentSharesI.label: Debt Conversion, Converted Instrument, Shares Issued
DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentSharesI.description: "The number of shares issued in exchange for the original debt being converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or payments in the period."

OtherLongTermNotesPayable.label: Other Notes Payable, Noncurrent
OtherLongTermNotesPayable.description: Amount of long-term notes classified as other, payable after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Current
FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as noncurrent.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

LossContingencyDamagesAwardedValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Awarded, Value
LossContingencyDamagesAwardedValue.description: Amount of damages awarded to the plaintiff in the legal matter.

MinorityInterestChangeInRedemptionValue.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Change in Redemption Value
MinorityInterestChangeInRedemptionValue.description: Change in noncontrolling interest during the period as a result of a change in the redemption value of redeemable noncontrolling interest.

PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

RepaymentsOfUnsecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Unsecured Debt
RepaymentsOfUnsecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt unsecured debt.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Finance Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

AccountsPayableOtherCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Other, Current
AccountsPayableOtherCurrent.description: Amount of obligations incurred classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ContractWithCustomerLiability.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
ContractWithCustomerLiability.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedC.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost, Current
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedC.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAs.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Goodwill and Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAs.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from intangible assets including goodwill.

DeferredTaxAssetsOtherComprehensiveLoss.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other Comprehensive Loss
DeferredTaxAssetsOtherComprehensiveLoss.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses in other comprehensive income.

DividendsPreferredStock.label: Dividends, Preferred Stock
DividendsPreferredStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Purchases
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of purchases of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Settlements
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of settlements of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.label: Finance Lease, Interest Payment on Liability
FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.description: Amount of interest paid on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYea.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYea.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Current
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToR.label: Proceeds from Collection of Long-term Loans to Related Parties
ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToR.description: The cash inflow associated with collection, whether partial or full, of long-term loans to a related party. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances to Affiliates.

ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Long-term Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

ProductWarrantyAccrualClassifiedCurrent.label: Product Warranty Accrual, Current
ProductWarrantyAccrualClassifiedCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for estimated claims under standard and extended warranty protection rights granted to customers. For classified balance sheets, represents the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Long-term Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RestructuringCosts.label: Restructuring Costs
RestructuringCosts.description: Amount, after cash payment, of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

SeveranceCosts1.label: Severance Costs
SeveranceCosts1.description: Amount of expenses for special or contractual termination benefits provided to current employees involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to one-time termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValueP.label: Stock and Warrants Issued During Period, Value, Preferred Stock and Warrants
StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValueP.description: Value of preferred stock and warrants for common stock issued.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.label: Value Added Tax Receivable, Current
ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

VariableInterestEntityPrimaryBeneficiary.label: Variable Interest Entity, Primary Beneficiary, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
VariableInterestEntityPrimaryBeneficiary.description: Amount of maximum exposure to loss from involvement with consolidated variable interest entity (VIE).
